reviewText: This DVD (The Periodic Table of the Elements: Alkali Metals) is part of the 5 Set DVD (Periodic Table of Elements DVD Set) Periodic Table Elements DVD Set 1. Alkali Metals 2. Alkaline Earth Metals 3. Transition Metals 4. Other Metals 5. Metalloids Product Description - Periodic Table of Elements DVD Set) Examine the role alkali metals play in fireworks. Explore the alkaline-earth metals, including calcium which is crucial for strong bones. Go inside a U.S. Navy aircraft carrier for a look at transition metals. Investigate how emerging metal technologies will change the way we drive in the future. And go behind-the-scenes to see the role metalloids play in making computers work. 2005,
